page.title: 04 Ecology_Birds of Prey
page.content: Hen harrier ,Buzzard,Sparrow_hawk ,Peregrine falcon ,Owl ,Kestrel and Kite are all birds of prey.They feed on rodents and small birds.Sometimes, when they are starving ,they catch rabbits. The Kestrel is found beside main roads, hunting for mice. Hen harriers,Sparrow hawk and Peregrine falcon all stay alert, looking out for prey. Likewise the Buzzard,who has it's nest on small crags.The birds' sharp talons help it to grasp their prey as they scoop it from the ground.The Buzzard and Kestrel are expert at hovering over fields,waiting for prey to appear. All these birds are fairly rare and are not often seen. The Kestrel often gets run over by traffic in its haste to get its prey.
